overview:
Gene Liu brings more than a decade of global commerce and executive management experience to PostRelease, growing and scaling both incubated and venture capital backed startups to Fortune 500 technology companies.

Prior to joining PostRelease, Gene led the software architecture team at Cooking.com to creating service platforms that were responsible for the success of Food Networkâ€™s international e-commerce expansion and the Starbucks online subscription service. Throughout his career, his focus has been in designing and building large-scale systems, with particular concentration on high availability, scalability, and throughput.

milestones.description: PostRelease Recognized as "Most Progressive Internet Company" at 2011 Internet Marketing Association Awards
